summary: Adds a new tree house style player-home near Swindler's Den.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/26141-1-1351453144.png[/img]

[youtube]j88EGssmlxI[/youtube]

***UPDATE*** Yopoman Compendium featuring updated Yuggoth, Forbidden Well, Swindler's Lookout and TONS of other small mods, changes, tweaks, updates, gameplay alterations, alchemy additions, etc... is available at the following link as an installer that points to the main Skyrim directory, activate/deactivate the mods as you please as they are modular and not dependent upon each other: http://www.satapop.com/yopoman_compendium_09_15_2013.exe

Big thanks to svaalbard for featuring this mod in his video series Skyrim Real Estate!

This mod adds a modest player home close to Swindler's Den. The new home is a tree house style structure nestled into the side of a small mountain. There is a sleeping area, full crafting station, respawn-safe item storage and a wonderful view of the plains.

Swindler's Lookout should be compatible with all mods.

Please do not re-upload my mod to any other site, for now it is Nexus only! Thank you.
author: Yopoman
